org.panthercode.arctic.core.arguments

Class ArgumentUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.panthercode.arctic.core.arguments.ArgumentUtils

  • public class ArgumentUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains functions to check arguments, whether they have a valid value. It's useful to asserting the right value of (method) parameters before using for processing.
